entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
